actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Postsecondary Education.

official_title: A bill to amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to provide for alternative reduction formulas in the event of short-falls in Pell Grant appropriations.

summary.text: Amends the Higher Education Act of 1965 to provide for alternative formulas for grant reduction in the event of insufficient appropriations under the Pell Grant program.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to provide for alternative reduction formulas in the event of short-falls in Pell Grant appropriations.
